#nametype [nametype]: 143

summoned with #351 Summon Bean Sidhe (Conjuration 5)

The Bean Sidhe is the wailing spirit of a long dead Sidhe woman who haunt the wilderness and predicts the death of men. To hear her wail is death assured. Once beautiful, the spirit woman is now a transparent apparition with pale, greenish skin.
